title: Attack on Titan
descriptions: In the year 845, the Colossal Titan breaches Wall Maria, leading to the destruction of humanity's safety.
Eren Yeager vows to destroy all Titans after witnessing his mother being eaten alive by a Titan.

title: My Hero Academia
descriptions: In a world where nearly 80% of the population has superpowers called 'Quirks', heroes and villains arise.
Izuku Midoriya, a Quirkless boy, inherits the power of One For All and starts his journey to become the greatest hero.

title: One Piece
descriptions: Monkey D. Luffy and his crew set sail across the Grand Line, seeking the ultimate treasure known as One Piece.
Luffy gathers a diverse crew of Straw Hat Pirates, each with their own dreams and ambitions.
